Built for Everyone in Real Estate

Whether you're a tenant, landlord, property manager, or service provider, UrbanHomes.ng has the perfect solution for you.

For Tenants

Find your perfect home, pay rent online, submit maintenance requests, and communicate with your property manager seamlessly.

  • Online rent payments
  • Maintenance requests
  • Document storage
  • Search For New Apartments
Learn More

For Landlords

Manage your properties efficiently with automated rent collection, tenant screening, and comprehensive reporting tools.

  • Automated rent collection
  • Tenant screening
  • Financial reporting
  • Property analytics
Learn More

For Property Managers

Scale your property management business with our comprehensive suite of tools designed for professional managers.

  • Portfolio management
  • Multi-property dashboard
  • Owner reporting
  • Team collaboration
Learn More

For Service Providers

Connect with tenants, property owners and managers, receive work orders, and grow your service business through our platform.

  • Work order management
  • Invoice processing
  • Rating system
  • Business growth tools
Learn More

Powerful Features for Modern Property Management

Everything you need to manage properties efficiently, all in one platform.

Online Payments

Secure online rent collection with multiple payment options including bank transfers, cards, and mobile money.

Maintenance Management

Streamlined maintenance request system with work order tracking and service provider management.

Analytics & Reporting

Comprehensive reports and analytics to track property performance and financial metrics.

Digital Lease Management

Create, sign, and manage lease agreements digitally with automated reminders and renewals.

Tenant Screening

Comprehensive tenant screening with credit checks, employment verification, and reference validation.

Mobile App

Full-featured mobile apps for iOS and Android to manage properties on the go.

Take UrbanHomes With You

Download our mobile apps and manage your properties anywhere, anytime. Available on iOS and Android with all the features you need.

Offline access
